tool.name: OGS: scaleProperty
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'scaleProperty'.
tool.command: if [ "$mesh" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$mesh.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$mesh' '${$mesh.element_identifier}'; fi; scaleProperty --property-name '$property_name' --mesh '$mesh.element_identifier' --input-unit '$input_unit' --out-mesh output_1.vtu

param.name: property_name
param.label: property name
param.help: the property the values are stored for

param.name: mesh
param.label: mesh
param.help: Input (.vtu). The input mesh is read from this file

tool.help: This tool runs the **scaleProperty** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
